definitions.text: causing fear or dread or terror
examples: a career or vengeance so direful that London was shocked
the dread presence of the headmaster
polio is no longer the dreaded disease it once was
an unspeakable odor came sweeping into the room

definitions.text: intensely or extremely bad or unpleasant in degree or quality
examples: under wicked fire from the enemy's guns

definitions.text: extreme in degree or extent or amount or impact
examples: spent a frightful amount of money
